Plugin DocumentationÂ¶

The following external plugins are currently available to extend the functionality of FogLAMP.

  • FogLAMP South Plugins
    • AM2315 Temperature & Humidity Sensor
      • Wiring The Sensor
    • CC2650 SensorTag
    • CoAP
    • Simple CSV Plugin
    • DHT11 (C version)
    • DHT11 (Python version)
    • DNP3 Master Plugin
      • DNP3 Out Station Testing
    • Enviro pHAT Plugin
    • Expression South Plugin
      • Expression Support
    • Flir AX8 Thermal Imaging Camera
    • South HTTP
    • INA219 Voltage & Current Sensor
      • Wiring The Sensor
    • Modbus South Plugin
      • Configuration Parameters
        • Register Map
        • Example Maps
    • MQTT Sparkplug B
    • OPC/UA South Plugin
      • Subscriptions
        • Configuration examples
    • Playback Plugin
      • Picking Columns
    • PT100 Temperature Sensor
      • Wiring The Sensor
    • Random
    • Random Walk
    • SenseHAT
    • Sinusoid
    • System Information
    • Advantech USB-4704
    • Beckhoff TwinCAT
      • Map Format
        • Example
        • Testing
    • Digiducer Vibration Sensor
  • FogLAMP North Plugins
    • Google Cloud Platform North Plugin
      • Prerequisites
        • Create GCP IoT Core Project
        • Download roots.pem
        • Create a Registry
        • Create a Device ID
        • Upload Your Certificates
        • Create Your North Task
    • North HTTP
    • North HTTP-C
    • Kafka Producer
    • OPCUA Server
    • ThingSpeak
    • InfluxDB Time Series Database
    • Splunk Data Collector
  • FogLAMP Filter Plugins
    • Asset Filter
      • Asset Rules
    • Change Filter
    • Delta Filter
    • Expression Filter
      • Expressions
    • Fast Fourier Transform Filter
    • Flir Validity Filter
    • Metadata Filter
      • Example Metadata
    • Python 2.7 Filter
      • Example
    • Python 3.5 Filter
      • Example
    • Rate Filter
    • Root Mean Squared (RMS) Filter
    • Scale Filter
    • Scale Set Filter
      • Example
    • Threshold Filter
      • Expressions
    • Down Sample Filter
    • Exponential Moving Average
    • Event Rate Filter
    • Simple Python Filter
    • Statistics Filter
    • Vibration Features Filter
  • FogLAMP Notification Rule Plugins
    • Moving Average Rule
    • Expression Rule
  • FogLAMP Notification Delivery Plugins
    • Amazon Alexa Notification
    • Asset Notification
    • Email Notifications
    • Google Chat
